metadata.name: The Quest Of Mandrieval : CHAPTER III
metadata.description:
A dark period that has come for approximately 60 days marked by wars between tribes, disputes between houses and even sports and art competitions can no longer be a tool to increase brotherly warmth.

The two gallant Knights (who will be called Troopers in the future) Ser Morbidden & Ser Bruce Pod and a Mandrill named Goon as a guide, get a quest from Queen Mos Extros the third to find a mysterious tribe in the shadow mountains inhabited by a group of intelligent mandrills, savage and has magical abilities such as shapeshifters, time travelers and even the physical strength of 1000 bears who are believed to be able to overcome war if they can make a deal with them.

After traveling for 9 days, these 3 characters ended up at the entrance to their destination. There is still time to wait for the sun to rise, they spend the night formulating a strategy for negotiating and facing any challenges that will be faced in the mountains.

Will they be able to complete the quest for world peace?
